com.att.aro.bp

Interface BestPracticeDisplayGroup

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BestPracticeDisplayGroupImpl

    public interface BestPracticeDisplayGroup
    Represents a group of best practices. Each best practice group is displayed as a block of best practices on the best practices tab.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<BestPracticeDisplay> getBestPractices()
      Returns the best practices that are included in this group.
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Returns the description of the best practice group.
      java.lang.String getHeaderName()
      Returns the text to be displayed in the block header for the best practice group.
      java.lang.String getReferSectionName()
      Returns a short name of the best practice group that will be used to refer to the section in a sentence such as: "Refer to the section on ".

    • Method Detail

      • getHeaderName

        java.lang.String getHeaderName()
        Returns the text to be displayed in the block header for the best practice group.
        Returns:
        header name text

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns the description of the best practice group. This description is displayed in the header of the best practice group block.
        Returns:
        best practice group description

      • getReferSectionName

        java.lang.String getReferSectionName()
        Returns a short name of the best practice group that will be used to refer to the section in a sentence such as: "Refer to the section on ".
        Returns:
        section refer name

      • getBestPractices

        java.util.Collection<BestPracticeDisplay> getBestPractices()
        Returns the best practices that are included in this group.
        Returns:
        Collection of best practice specifications
